subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: After a late-night trip to the dentist during which he endured two root canals, Tampa Bay forward Martin St. Louis vowed at Thursday to even the score a day after a 3-0 loss to Pittsburgh.
snippet: After a late-night trip to the dentist during which he endured two root canals, Tampa Bay forward Martin St. Louis vowed at Thursday to even the score a day after a 3-0 loss to Pittsburgh.
